name: Forever Unchanging
text: Give to the Karnak Mander-Azur player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: . Exhaust Karnak Mander-Azur → remove Forever Unchanging from the game. . Until the end of the next hero phase, you cannot ready or change forms. Discard this obligation.

name: Kree Invasion
text: “We, of the Kree race, have power so much greater than yours that it must seem like virtual magic to you.” Threat cannot be removed from here if the Supreme Intelligence is in play. [crisis]

name: Supreme Intelligence
text: [star] Forced Interrupt: When Supreme Intelligence would attack, he schemes instead. (Karnak's nemesis minion.) [star] Boost: Add 2 threat to the main scheme.

name: Kree Soldier
text: When Revealed: When Kree Soldier engages with you, either spend a [mental] resource or add 2 threat to the main scheme. [star] Boost: Put Kree Soldier into play engaged with you.

name: Collective Intelligence
text: Attach to the villain. Forced Interrupt: After resolving the effects of a treachery card, shuffle it back into the encounter deck instead of discarding it. Hero Action: Spend [mental] [mental] resources → discard this card.
